weekOf: February 19th to February 26th (Not live until ~5am EDT on February 19th)
introMessages: Earn illicit profits by taking advantage of discounts on Counterfeit Cash Factories and boosted bottom lines on Clubhouse Contracts, MC Work and Challenges, Street Dealer Sales, and more.
Meanwhile, the Lunar New Year celebration continues over the next two weeks with Triple Rewards (6X for GTA+ Members) on all Lunar New Year Stunt Races.
prizeRideChallenge: Place Top 4 in the LS Car Meet Series
premiumRace: Art to Art, locked to Motorcycle
weeklyChallenge: Win 2 Stunt Races to receive GTA$100,000
bonuses: 3X GTA$ and RP - All Lunar New Year Stunt Races (6X for GTA+ Members)
2X GTA$ and RP - Biker Clubhouse Contracts, MC Work, and MC Challenges
2X GTA$ and RP - Community Combat Series
discounts: 40% Off: Counterfeit Cash Factory Upgrades and Modifications
